page.title: 08RELIGION (cont)
page.content: There were three English chapels:Salem Apostolic,Peniel Green Congregational and Lon Las Mission.These chapels had three facts in common. 1.All were evangelical chapels. 2.All were well attended and had growing congregations. 3.All were actively involved in the local community,especially with children and young people. There was one church,St Samlet Parish Church.This was also quite well attended and the clergy often visited local schools to take services in assembly. We held a survey in school to find out how many children and adults attended church. Children attending Sunday School=15% Children attending Sunday services=7% Parents attending Sunday services=7% Parents attending services in week=5%
